servinfo.title: Surge – Engine power variation under steady throttle or cruise. Feels like vehicle speeds up and down with no change in accelerator pedal
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model and Engine Basic Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model .

condition.ptxt: Surge – Engine power variation under steady throttle or cruise. Feels like vehicle speeds up and down with no change in accelerator pedal
